Articles.Content:
Here you can post links to some of your old posts and threads. It's really fun to delve back into the forum's past.

Take this one, for example.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68568-Little-green-rectangles-under-your-username'>http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68568-Little-green-rectangles-under-your-username

And look at me now! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Remember the rules on thread necromancy, though, folks!

This thread brought me to 2 rep bars, if I remember correct:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101630-Kerbal-Barbecue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101630-Kerbal-Barbecue)

I still like the sunshade.

The Kegway...

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95544-The-Kegway-Yes-a-Kerbal-Segway](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95544-The-Kegway-Yes-a-Kerbal-Segway)!

that was a ball o fun

Things from 1-2 years ago? That's not nostalgia, [http://users.compaqnet.be/ShadowSoft/](http://users.compaqnet.be/ShadowSoft/) <-- THAT is nostalgia. An old crappy page from 2001 that I lost access to and could no longer edit. It's from a 3D engine and game I was developing with a friend near the end of my college days. I was already an old programmer by then and getting into advanced 3D graphics and physics simulations.

I tried finding my old GeoCities page from 1994 or 95 but it seems GeoCities no longer exists ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Things from 1-2 years ago? That's not nostalgia, [http://users.compaqnet.be/ShadowSoft/](http://users.compaqnet.be/ShadowSoft/) <-- THAT is nostalgia. An old crappy page from 2001 that I lost access to and could no longer edit. It's from a 3D engine and game I was developing with a friend near the end of my college days. I was already an old programmer by then and getting into advanced 3D graphics and physics simulations.
> I tried finding my old GeoCities page from 1994 or 95 but it seems GeoCities no longer exists ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Don't worry, the Wayback Machine will save the day!

Link to screenshot of GeoCities home page from 1996: [http://web.archive.org/web/19961022173245/http://www.geocities.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/19961022173245/http://www.geocities.com/)

Please tell me if this is what you are talking about in this thread.
